query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		__field {
			args,
			deprecationReason,
			description,
			isDeprecated,
			name,
			type {
				description,
				enumValues,
				fields,
				inputFields,
				interfaces,
				kind,
				name,
				ofType {
					description,
					enumValues,
					fields,
					inputFields,
					interfaces,
					kind,
					name,
					possibleTypes,
				},
				possibleTypes,
			},
		}
	}
